document_data.name: Planar Church of Olympus
document_data.mainbody: The '''Planar Church of Olympus''' was a temple in the city of [[Bral]], the sole city on the surface of the [[Rock of Bral]], dedicated to the [[Planar Church of Olympus|planar church of the same name]].
document_data.Location: This temple was located in the [[Bral/Temple District|Temple District]] of the [[Middle City]] of Bral, across the road from the [[Planar Church of the Seven Heavens (Bral)|Planar Church of the Seven Heavens]].
document_data.Activities: The clergy of this temple spent a lot of their time aiding the poor and common folk of Bral. Those who had a patron deity inhabiting Olympus especially received aid.
document_data.History: In the 14{{th}} century DR, this Bralian sect of the Planar Church of Olympus was rather small, but over time it quickly rose in popularity as piracy and lawless were cracked down upon.
